Wisdom: الْأَمَلُ يُنْسِي الْأَجَلَ
enWisdom: NULL

Wisdom: الْأَمَلُ حِجَابُ الْأَجَلِ
enWisdom: Hope is the veil of death

Wisdom: أَكْذِبُوا آمَالَكُمْ وَاغْتَنِمُوا آجَالَكُمْ بِأَحْسَنِ أَعْمَالِكُمْ وَبَادِرُوا مُبَادَرَةَ أُولِي النُّهَى وَالْأَلْبَابِ
enWisdom: Belie your hopes and take advantage of your lifetimes to perform your best deeds, and hasten with the hastening of the wise and those endowed with understanding

Wisdom: بِئْسَ الشِّيمَةُ الْأَمَلُ يُفْنِي الْأَجَلَ وَيُفَوِّتُ الْعَمَلَ
enWisdom: The worst habit is hoping [for too much] as it wastes one’s lifetime and causes one to lose [the opportunity to perform good] deeds

Wisdom: أَلَا وَإِنَّكُمْ فِي أَيَّامِ أَمَلٍ مِنْ وَرَائِهِ أَجَلٌ فَمَنْ عَمِلَ فِي أَيَّامِ أَمَلِهِ قَبْلَ حُضُورِ أَجَلِهِ نَفَعَهُ عَمَلُهُ وَلَمْ يَضْرُرْهُ [يَضُرَّهُ‏] أَجَلُهُ
enWisdom: Indeed you are in the days of hope after which is death; so whoever acts in the days of his hope before the coming of his death, his action benefits him and his death does him no harm

Wisdom: إِنَّ الْمَرْءَ يُشْرِفُ عَلَى أَمَلِهِ فَيَقْطَعُهُ حُضُورُ أَجَلِهِ فَسُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ لَا أَمَلٌ يُدْرَكُ وَلَا مُؤَمِّلٌ يُتْرَكُ
enWisdom: Indeed man reaches near [the realization of] his hopes, when the [sudden] approach of his death cuts them short, then Glory be to Allah! Neither is the hope realized nor is the hoper spared

Wisdom: آفَةُ الْآمَالِ حُضُورُ الْآجَالِ
enWisdom: The bane of aspirations is the coming of death

Wisdom: آفَةُ الْأَمَلِ الْأَجَلُ
enWisdom: The bane of hope is death

Wisdom: بَادِرُوا الْأَمَلَ [بِالْأَمَلِ‏] وَسَابِقُوا هُجُومَ‏ الْأَجَلِ فَإِنَّ النَّاسَ يُوشِكُ أَنْ يَنْقَطِعَ بِهِمُ الْأَمَلُ فَيَرْهَقَهُمُ الْأَجَلُ
enWisdom: Surpass your hope and anticipate the assault of death, for people are on the verge of having their hopes cut short and being surprised by death

Wisdom: سابقا [سَابِقُوا الْأَجَلَ فَإِنَّ النَّاسَ يُوشِكُ أَنْ يَنْقَطِعَ بِهِمُ الْأَمَلُ فَيَرْهَقُهُمُ الْأَجَلُ
enWisdom: Anticipate death, for verily the hopes of people are on the verge of being cut short as death comes upon them

Wisdom: غُرُورُ الْأَمَلِ يُنْفِدُ الْمَهَلَ وَيُدْنِي الْأَجَلَ
enWisdom: The deception of hope wastes time and brings death closer

Wisdom: فِي غُرُورِ الْآمَالِ انْقِضَاءُ الْآجَالِ
enWisdom: In the deception of hopes, lifetimes lapse

Wisdom: قَصِّرْ أَمَلَكَ فَمَا أَقْرَبَ أَجَلَكَ
enWisdom: Reduce your hopes, for your death is indeed near!

Wisdom: لَوْ ظَهَرَتِ الْآجَالُ لَافْتَضَحَتِ الْآمَالُ
enWisdom: If the appointed times of death were to become known, the [secret] hopes [of people] would be exposed

Wisdom: لَوْ رَأَيْتُمُ الْأَجَلَ وَمَسِيرَهُ لَأَبْغَضْتُمُ الْأَمَلَ وَغُرُورَهُ
enWisdom: If you were to see death and its approach, you would surely hate [false] aspiration and its deception

Wisdom: مَنْ غَرَّتْهُ الْأَمَانِيُّ كَذَّبَتْهُ الْآجَالُ
enWisdom: One who is deceived by aspirations is belied by death

Wisdom: مَنْ وَثِقَ بِالْأُمْنِيَّةِ قَطَعَتْهُ الْمَنِيَّةُ
enWisdom: One who trusts his aspirations will have them severed by death

Wisdom: مَنْ جَرَى فِي مَيْدَانِ أَمَلِهِ عَثَرَ بِأَجَلِهِ
enWisdom: One who proceeds on the path of his hopes, stumbles upon his death

Wisdom: مَنْ جَرَى فِي عِنَانِ أَمَلِهِ عَثَرَ بِأَجَلِهِ
enWisdom: One who rides with the reins of his aspiration stumbles over his death

Wisdom: مَا أَقْرَبَ الْأَجَلَ مِنَ الْأَمَلِ
enWisdom: How close hope is to death!

Wisdom: مَا أَقْطَعَ الْأَجَلَ مِنَ الْأَمَلِ
enWisdom: How severing is death for hope!

Wisdom: مَا أَطَالَ أَحَدٌ الْأَمَلَ إِلَّا نَسِيَ الْأَجَلَ وَأَسَاءَ الْعَمَلَ
enWisdom: No one lengthens his hopes except that he forgets death and performs evil actions

Wisdom: لَا تَخْلُو النَّفْسُ مِنَ الْأَمَلِ حَتَّى تَدْخُلَ فِي الْأَجَلِ
enWisdom: The soul does not become devoid of hope until it comes upon death
